channel.title: How to edit
channel.description:
Dropped items and drop rates (from npcs) The NPCdef file is saved as .xml.gz, and I can't edit it.
also, how do I add fatique, so that it adds 1 after each kill.
I also require some help to make a command that gives the admin full rune.
this is for rscd source, please help me.
Cheers,
Dre
